A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TLJ is a terrific film.  The 2.5 hrs flew by\, and as the end approached\, I wished it would not end (10 PM showing).  The characters were compelling and well defined.  The pacing was tight and the action sequences propelled plot and character all while being nail biting and exhilarating.  I would get be it 5 stars\, but why on earth was a non-force wielding praetorian able to restrain Kylo Ren?  That was sloppy.  If they wanted to have Rey Save Kylo like he saved her\, they should have done it in a way that retained the superiority of the Force.
